name: A Short Story - FEMICOM Game Jam #1 Submission
name_original: A Short Story - FEMICOM Game Jam #1 Submission
description:
A Short Story is an interactive bedtime story about a girl that goes for a walk at night, and meets a sad forest creature that she must cheer up.

It is a conversational game, with a couple branches in dialogue.
This game was created for the FEMICOM Game Jam #1: Here's to Theresa Duncan! If you're not familiar with Theresa Duncan's work I suggest looking her up.

Sorry much about the narration voice. I made this in a hurry! :)
